title.rendered: Valentine’s Day at the Esplanade Hotel in Zagreb

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Spend the most romantic Valentine’s Day at the Esplanade Hotel in Zagreb 

This Valentine’s Day, surprise your loved one with a romantic dinner or a sumptuous package that includes an overnight stay in the elegant setting of the Esplanade Hotel, indulge in an atmosphere of glamour and contemporary design, and remind yourself just why everything is so wonderful when you are in love.

 

Ignite the spark of love and passion in the magical ambience of Zinfandel’s Restaurant to a backdrop of flickering candlelight, a welcome glass of Tomac Millennium Rosé sparkling wine, red roses, six courses of sensual delicacies selected by Executive Chef Ana Grgić Tomić, and mellow classic love songs curated by DJ Jurki. All ladies will be welcomed with a generous fragrant gift by award-winning Croatian skincare brand Nikel.

 

The Valentine’s Day dinner is HRK 770 per person. The menu is available on Valentine’s Day, on Monday, 14 February 2022. The number of tables is limited.

 

Valentine’s Day package, in addition to the romantic dinner, includes enjoying the luxury of the Superior Room with premium sparkling wine, a Valentine’s Day dessert, and roses to complement the ambience. The package also includes à la carte breakfast in your room or in the restaurant, use of the sauna and fitness centre, early check-in/late check-out, superfast Wi-Fi, and the PressReader Hot Zone for free downloads of newspapers and magazines during your stay. The price of the package is EUR 365* and is valid only for overnight stays on 14/15 February 2022 for two people.

 

Pamper your loved one with a perfect gift that they will remember forever.
See:
  • MENU for the Valentine’s Day gala dinner at Zinfandel’s
  • Package for 2022 Valentine’s Day Overnight Stay
Additional notes for the overnight stay package:
1. VAT is included in the price of the package. The price of the package is for two people.
2. *The price in EUR (€) is for informational purposes only. The actual price depends on the exchange rate on the day of payment/checkout.
3. Tourist tax in the amount of EUR 1.60 per person per day is not included in the price.
4. It is possible to upgrade your room category at an additional charge, as well as pay for an additional overnight stay at a special price.
5. The offer is available subject to capacity availability. Due to the epidemiological measures in force, the number of tables during brunch and dinner at Zinfandel’s is limited.
6. All other services and offers that are not listed in the Valentine’s Day Package are subject to additional charges and can be ordered in advance when booking the package.
